TenMilManUI/UI/State/Util/hash_pair.h

00001 #ifndef HASH_PAIR_H_
00002 #define HASH_PAIR_H_
00003 
00004 #include <functional>
00005 #include <map>
00006 #include <string>
00007 
00008 #include <tr1/unordered_map>
00009 #include <tr1/memory>
00010 
00011 using std::pair;
00012 using std::string;
00013 using std::unary_function;
00014 
00015 using std::tr1::hash;
00016 using std::tr1::shared_ptr;
00017 
00018 template<class TC>
00019 struct hash_pair : public unary_function< const pair<TC, TC>&, size_t> {
00020         size_t operator()(const pair<TC,TC>& val) const{
00021                 hash<string> functor = hash<string>(); 
00022                 size_t seed = functor(val.first);
00023                 seed =  functor(val.second) + 0x9e3779b9 + (seed << 6) + (seed >> 2);
00024                 return seed;
00025         }
00026 };
00027 
00028 #endif /*HASH_PAIR_H_*/
